windows.changelog:
A new release is here with some bug fixes and improvements:

  • Much improved scrolling experience overall, also fixes issues with the scrollbar changing size frequently
  • Fixed issue on Windows and Linux where there is a long delay to press Kanban tasks
  • We now highlight kanban tasks when hovered to let users know they can drag them
  • Fixed issue where converting empty text to Drop Cap resulted in the wrong cursor position
  • Fixed some wrong links in the About window

Thanks for all the community feedback! We have a lot more to show, stay tuned.

Join our Discord for discussions, and feel free to email us. We love to hear from our users.
